document_data.name: ''Devil's Clasp''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''devil's clasp''''' was a protective [[magic item]]. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The clasp could reflect a portion of the power of incoming attacks back at the wearer's attackers in a fashion similar to a ''[[hellish rebuke]]'' spell.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Farideh]], a [[tiefling]] [[warlock]], was said to possess a ''devil's clasp'' while adventuring in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
